text: Rendy Oscario Sroyer (born in October 7, 1998), is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Liga 2 club Semen Padang. ==Career== ===Semen Padang=== He was signed for Semen Padang to played in Indonesia Soccer Championship in 2016. == Honours == === Club === Semen Padang * Liga 2 runner-up: 2018 ==References== ==External links== * Rendy Oscario at Liga Indonesia * Rendy Oscario at Soccerway Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Semen Padang F.C. players
title: Rendy Oscario
